thread.title: Ticket Sales Representative - College Sports

title: Ticket Sales Representative - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Ticket Sales Representative   Market and sell full seasons, partial seasons, group tickets, and mini ticket plans, through outbound sales activities for all ticketed sports; outbound sales activity includes phone sales...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
